plot: Larry goes bra-shopping for his maid, landing him in trouble with her husband and his neighbors.

Larry goes bra shopping for his housekeeper, but her vengeful husband Jesus doesn't like it one bit. Fortunately for Larry, the only things that can save him are a pair of noisy orthoses and a prop from Mel Gibson's "The Passion Of The Christ".—halo1k

Larry's wife starts complaining that Maria, their maid, doesn't wear a bra while she works. To remedy the situation, Larry volunteers to buy her something she'll be comfortable working in. Maria's husband Jesus, however, doesn't take kindly to Larry's assistance, nor do Larry's neighbors when they catch him using their laundry to compare sizes. Meanwhile, Larry is driving everyone crazy with his squeaky orthoses.—Jean-Marc Rocher <rocher@fiberbit.net>
